ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, everyone new to RPGing: Crow Lord has volonteered (because he has nothing better to do) to run a Beginners RPG for the Neo Beast Wars RPG. This RPG will

Subject: For beginners:
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Hey, everyone new to RPGing:

Crow Lord has volonteered (because he has nothing better to do) to run a 
'Beginners RPG' for the Neo Beast Wars RPG. This RPG will cover most RPGing 
stuff (battle, etc...), and will (hopefully) make people in it better at 
RPGing. It'll also be a good opportunity for experienced RPGers to improve 
their skills. I'm going to go ahead and list people who I think might want to 
be in it (please don't take offence at this, it's just a list).

icedemon101@...,
earth2025abc@...,
Me (hey, this isn't just to learn, it's also to practice).

If you want to be in it, just email crow_lord@..., and tell him. This 
isn't just for people new to RPGing, it's for everyone.
